item.title: Tyler Perry's New WW2 Movie Becomes Netflix Global Success Despite 50% Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: The new World War II movie on Netflix directed by Tyler Perry has received mixed reviews but has still managed to be a global streaming hit.

item.title: Doc & Marty Were NOT Back To The Future's First Time Travelers
item.description: Back to the Future features the world's first successful time travel experiment - but it's not Doc Brown or Marty in the driving seat of the DeLorean.

item.title: Paddington In Peru: Release Date, Cast, Story, Trailer & Everything We Know About Paddington 3
item.description: Everyone's favorite marmalade-loving bear Paddington is all set for his big screen return, and here's everything we know about Paddington in Peru.
